title: Bug 122165Publish template action should warn before overwriting existing template
description: (Similar to FileSave As warning when overwriting an existing file.
OB: )Actual result:The template just gets written without a warning.
EB: Bug 122165Publish template action should warn before overwriting existing template Publish a template to the templates folder.Make a change to the template.Publish it again.Expected result:Warning dialog that you are about to overwrite the existing template.
